document_data.name: Mamblat
document_data.mainbody: '''Mamblat''', nicknamed '''"Happy"''', was a [[minstrel]] from the city of [[Hillsfar]] by the [[Moonsea]].
document_data.Personality: Mamblat was a friendly and good-humored figure.
document_data.History: Around [[1370 DR]], Happy Mamblat was one of the more well-known itinerant minstrels wandering [[the Vast]]. They were loved by many for their personality.
